I'm thinking multiple stuffies would make for some fun games in multiplayer. I'll have to obtain a few more and test that out.

Posted By: NotACatPerson (12/11/2012 2:27:45 PM)

posts.post_content:
I threw together a deck around this guy like 5 minutes ago. I haven't played it yet but everyone tell me what you think:  
  
4x Stuffy doll  
4x Shivan meteor  
4x Pariah  
4x Obelisk of naya  
1x Garruk relentless  
4x Lightning bolt  
4x Dawn charm  
4x March of souls  
4x Wear away  
4x Aftershock  
4x Mwonvuli beast tracker  
1x Sunhome, fortress of the legion  
4x Kher keep  
5x Forest  
5x Plains  
4x Mountain  
  
If you're wondering why there's a Sunhome there, it's so that you can give your enemies double strike when they are blocked by stuffy.
